duties_responsibilities.duty: Voucher invoices from Dealer Tire vendors in an accurate and timely manner.
Voucher non-inventory invoices using standard entry.
Investigate and resolve invoice discrepancies and issues.
Research and resolve routine and non-routine inquiries from internal and external customers.
Research and provide support documentation for audits.
Monitor and manage the Vendor Short Account (10.2335) for assigned tire vendors.
Research and monitor RNV for assigned tire vendors.
Provide supported recommendations for RNV write-offs on a monthly basis.
Match and Mail all disbursement checks.
Assist the Accounts Payable Manager in the preparation of miscellaneous reports and analysis.
Compile, process and distribute daily PPV reports.
Monitor and track PPV responses for timely

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED required, Bachelors degree in Accounting or related field preferred.
